Please, wait while we are checking information
To load information check your internet connection and press \"Load\"
The application needs to download about ## mb of data. Continue?

The application needs to download about ## mb of data. However, since you are connected to a mobile network, your mobile operator may charge you for downloading them. Continue?\n\n Otherwise, you can connect to any Wi-Fi network and try again.
Please, wait while we are loading data
Make sure, your internet connection is working or ask your supervisor for help.
An error occurred while reading the data. Try to download it again.
You will be returned to the Log In page \n\nAre you sure you want to Log Out?
